about_the_game:
A Thousand Shores is a storytelling game with a free adventure that allows you to ride horses, ostriches, and other adventures while learning about what happened on the coast, on hills, in caves, on boats, and even in trees, and everything else you can reach.

As a result of Raify's rebellion, the mage Dhaka was defeated in a crucial battle. Since then, this fertile land with thousands of coasts has been filled with the dark forces of the wizard Favi. Thanks to the providence of the heavens, Dhaka was able to save his life, but since then he can only wander around, and as soon as he sets foot on this land, roots will grow under his feet, and people will not be able to move. However, how could Dhaka, who knew how to phantasmagined, be stumped, if someone saw an eagle hovering around the boat, there was a high probability that they would be lucky enough to see Dhaka. This is a saying that circulates among the people of the small town of Gil. They miss Dhaka. Dhaka is also in contact with the stragglers. The hope of restoring light and order to this land rests on them, and our protagonist is one of them.

Players are free to explore the vast world, come and go as they please, and learn about the stories that have happened in different places.

Collect materials to craft a variety of things, such as gems, weapons, food, and more. Some productions require certain skills to be learned. Ready-made costumes, weapons, etc. can be changed freely.

Choose your own adventure route and mode of travel. For example, if you can't swim to a place, you can reach it with the help of a boat.

Multiple roles are supported, and characters can be quickly switched through shortcut keys.

You can choose between conversations with neutral characters and get different storylines.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+ 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R7 360, GeForce GTX 750 Ti, or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+ 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 580, GeForce GTX 1060, or similar (with 4+ GB of VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
